segment.source: The following sample script creates a version of Windows PE with Windows PowerShell and its DISM and Storage cmdlets, which can be used to help automate Windows deployment.
segment.target: The following sample script creates a version of Windows PE with Windows PowerShell and its DISM and Storage cmdlets, which can be used to help automate Windows deployment.
